text: Queen Oja (b 1950) is an Indian politician. She has been elected to the Lok Sabha, lower house of the Parliament of India from Guwahati, Assam in the 2019 Indian general election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. She was earlier the Mayor of Guwahati. ==References== ==External links== * Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Assam Category:Asom Gana Parishad politicians Category:Living people Category:People from Guwahati Category:Mayors of places in India Category:Women mayors of places in India Category:20th-century women politicians Category:20th-century Indian women politicians Category:17th Lok Sabha members Category:1950 births
title: Queen Oja
